Vercel API Proxy

item.title: Generate a list of all hugo-fixit theme components.
item.description:
action-component-list | FixIt

This is a GitHub Action to generate a list of all hugo-fixit theme components.

How to use

You can reference different stable versions of this action. For more information, see Versioning in the GitHub Actions toolkit.

item.title: Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.
item.description:
cmpt-mdevtools

Mobile devtools component powered by vConsole and eruda.

Requirements

  • FixIt v0.3.9 or later.
  • eruda
  • vConsole

Install Component

The installation method is the same as installing a theme. There are several ways to install, choose one, for example, install through Hugo Modules:
